alert.note: Alert for Inland Southern Brevard (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 16 at 3:46PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Brevard County through 415 PM EDT... At 346 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles southwest of Palm Bay, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Palm Bay. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
